layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutSVGRoot {svg} at (100,100) size 500x300
    LayoutSVGForeignObject {foreignObject} at (100,100) size 500x300
      LayoutBlockFlow {div} at (0,0) size 500x183
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,1) size 490x181
          text run at (0,1) width 490: "Select this text using"
          text run at (0,62) width 478: "the mouse, it should"
          text run at (0,123) width 338: "not disappear!"
